aboutUs_expertise_content: With over 18 years in the industry, our team comprises some of the most knowledgeable professionals in online gaming. Our extensive experience allows us to stay ahead of trends and continuously improve our offerings. We pride ourselves on being at the forefront of technology, ensuring that our platform is always up-to-date with the latest advancements. Our developers work tirelessly to create games that are not only visually stunning but also packed with exciting features. We partner with leading software providers to bring you high-quality games that deliver an immersive experience.
aboutUs_joinUs_title: Join Us on This Exciting Journey
account: "Account": a personal account opened by you on the Internet Site
additionalTerms: In addition, you also agree to be bound by any additional terms and conditions of promotions, bonuses and special offers which may be found on the Website or communicated to you from time to time.
all_streaks: All streaks are available to players daily from 00:00 UTC to 23:59 UTC. Wheel Spins are valid for 3 days after being credited.
as_you_continue: As you continue your journey on {client_name} and play your favorite games, you will unlock various loyalty levels, each offering exclusive benefits and a unique name.
becomeVipDescription: Reach level 6 and get invited to our exclusive VIP program.
card_title1: Fast & Easy Way to get started
cardone_title: Say goodbye to waiting – you can now withdraw your big wins instantly!
cardthree_title: You will never get bored, we have over 10,000 games from 50+ providers.
cardtwo_title: Add €100 and we’ll triple it. Yes, €300 in your account. And that’s just for your 1st deposit
carouselDescription: Experience unparalleled rewards, cashback, personalized account management, and exclusive tournaments that redefine your gaming journey. Embrace a new standard of luxury and benefits, meticulously crafted just for you.
changesToCookiePolicyNote: If there are any material changes to this Cookie Policy, you will be notified by email, on our sites, or by posting a prominent notice on our Websites prior to the change becoming effective. We encourage you to periodically review this page for the latest information on our cookie practices. Your continued use of our Websites constitutes your agreement to this Cookie Policy. If you do not accept the terms of this Cookie Policy, you can discontinue use of our Websites, or disable cookies.
check_event: Complete Your Streaks: Earn wheel spins by completing your daily, super, and mega streaks!

client: "Client", "You" or "Player": the visitor who has registered with us on the site and in whose name an Account has been opened.
cookieFunction1: To enable, facilitate and streamline the functioning of our sites across different webpages and browser sessions
cookieFunction2: To simplify your access to and use of our sites and make it more seamless
cookieFunction3: To monitor and analyze the performance, operation and effectiveness of our sites, so that we can improve and optimize it
cookieFunction4: To show you content that is more relevant to you
cookiesPolicyIntro: {client_name} uses cookies to improve player experience and enable certain functionality. {client_name} uses 'cookies' in conjunction with its Websites and Services to obtain information. A cookie is a small data file that is transferred to your device (e.g., your phone or your computer) for record-keeping purposes. For example, a cookie could allow the Websites to recognize your browser, while another could store your preferences and other information.
cookiesPolicyNote: Your browser may allow you to set how it handles cookies, such as declining all cookies or prompting you to decide whether to accept each cookie. But please note that some parts of the Websites or Services may not work as intended or may not work at all without cookies.
daily_streak: Daily Streak: Complete this streak to earn 1 spin of the wheel.
definitionsContext: The following words and terms should be interpreted as follows, unless the context clearly implies otherwise.
disablingCookiesNote: Most browsers automatically accept cookies, but you can modify your browser setting to turn off cookies. If you choose to decline turn off, please note that some interactive features of our sites may not function properly.
disagreementTerms: If you do not agree with any of the terms of this Agreement, do not click “I agree”, do not continue to use the website, download, install or otherwise use the software, and remove the software from your computer.
discrepancy: • Should there be any discrepancy between the T&Cs in the English language version and the version in any other language, the English version will supersede.
each_wheel: Each wheel spin offers 6 different rewards at random.
earn_points_simple: Earning points is simple! Just place wagers in your favorite games. The more you wager, the more points you earn, bringing you closer to higher levels and exciting rewards. Here's how the points system works:
employeeRestriction: No employees, executives, managers, directors, consultants, agents, affiliated companies, providers or sellers of the Company, or anyone else having access to inside information, can participate in any of the Games during their term of employment and/or engagement. Relatives of these parties are not authorized to use the Software directly or indirectly, unless expressly allowed to play on the Internet Site by means of written authorization by us. If this clause is breached, we reserve the right to close the Account immediately and to cancel payment on any gain. This shall take place without any prejudice to the rights that the Company has against the breaching person in terms of the employment or any other contract between the same person and the Company.
footer2: Welcome to {client_name}, the ultimate online destination for tantalizing entertainment and enticing bonuses. Here, you’ll enjoy the best Free Spins, games from accredited providers, and a VIP program tailored to meet your individual needs.
footer3: With over 10,000 games from the industry's top software providers and incredible daily promotions, {client_name} is the place to play. Start your {client_name} bonanza with a massive Welcome Offer of 600% up to €40,000 on your first four deposits. After that, you'll qualify for our regular promotions and bonuses.
internetSite: "Internet Site": This website and all other websites connected to it or to the Software and accessible through links or other access paths and the services available through such sites.
join_client_name: Join the {client_name} Loyalty Program today and start earning incredible rewards for your loyalty!
keepDetailsUpdated: You must maintain your account and keep your details up-to-date.
legalAge: You may only use the Website if you are the legal age according to the corresponding national legislation. In any event you may not use the Website if you are under 18 years of age.
levelUpDescription: Earn Loyalty points, level-up and gain access to new exciting rewards & tournaments.
level_eight: Level 8 and above: Eligible for a percentage of rakeback up to $40, for every $10,000 wagered.
levelthree_seven: Levels 3 to 7: Eligible for a percentage of rakeback for every $1,000 wagered.
loyalty_1: The rakeback offer is only open to players from Level 3 and above
loyalty_2: The rakeback is given in cash (no wagering requirements) automatically each time a player completes wagering $1,000/$10,000 (depending on the player's level) on eligible games.
loyalty_3: Some game categories do not contribute to the wagering for the rakeback: All Roulettes, Crash, Scratch, and Dice games are excluded.
loyalty_4: Additional games that do not contribute to the wagering for the rakeback will be listed below.
mega_streak: Mega Streak: Complete the most challenging streak and receive a whopping 7 spins on the wheel.
modifyTerms: • We reserve the right to suspend, add, end, amend and/or supplement these T&Cs from time to time as deemed appropriate. We are under no obligation to verify if all Clients use the Internet Site and/or the Software according to the updated rules of these T&Cs. The version posted on the Internet Site(s) is the effective version, and that which you should use as reference. It is your responsibility to inform yourself regarding the T&Cs, as well as being familiarized with the modifications that affect or will affect you.
now_title: Now, let's talk about our daily streaks, which you can enjoy starting from level 1. These daily wagering streaks run parallel, giving you more chances to spin the wheel and win big! Here's what each streak offers:
oneAccount: You may only open one Account on the Internet Site. We reserve the right to close an Account at any time and to cancel all the transactions pertaining to any Player who has registered more than one Account in his/her own name or under different names. We reserve the right to block regular or tournament play and/or prize distribution should any evidence of multi-accounting arise.
otherTechnologiesNote: Our sites may also use other technologies with similar functionality to cookies, such as web beacons and tracking URLs to obtain anonymous data about users. We may also use web beacons and tracking URLs in our messages to you to determine whether you have opened a certain message or accessed a certain link.
ownDetails: You may only open an Account using your own name and personal details.
p_d_1: Kickstart your gaming journey with our unbeatable welcome offer! Make your first deposit today and enjoy a 200% bonus to boost your play. Triple your deposit and dive into the excitement with extra funds. Don’t miss out—claim your bonus now and experience the thrill of {client_name} !
p_d_2: Keep the momentum going! On your second deposit, enjoy a 100% bonus, doubling your deposit and giving you even more chances to win. Don't let the excitement stop—boost your balance and continue your winning streak at {client_name} today!
p_d_3: The rewards keep coming! On your third deposit, enjoy a 125% bonus, giving your balance an extra boost to keep the excitement rolling. Don’t miss out—take your gameplay to the next level with {client_name}!
p_d_4: The rewards are bigger than ever! Make your fourth deposit and receive a 175% bonus, giving you even more funds to play with. Keep the fun going and maximize your winning potential at {client_name}!
p_d_5: Unlock exclusive rewards, personalized offers, and VIP treatment with the Betz Royalty Program. The more you play, the higher you climb, enjoying perks like priority support, special bonuses, and access to elite events. Elevate your gaming experience and be treated like royalty every step of the way!
p_d_6: Get the royal treatment every Tuesday at Betz! Enjoy a 25% bonus on deposits up to $50 or a 50% bonus on deposits over $50. Take advantage of this exclusive offer and boost your balance for an exciting day of winning!
p_d_7: Jump into the weekend with our Friday Fortune Frenzy! Get a 25% bonus on deposits up to $50, or supercharge your play with a 50% bonus on deposits over $50. Don’t miss out on your chance to turn Friday into your lucky day at {client_name}!
privacyPolicyAccount: By opening an account with {client_name} Gaming Platform, User consents that {client_name} Gaming Platform uses his/her personal data for the following purposes:
privacyPolicyAccount1: Performance of these T&Cs by Us, our Suppliers and any third party acting on our behalf
privacyPolicyAccount2: Own internal marketing and promotion of activities
privacyPolicyAccount3: Storage and processing in terms of the laws & regulations covering anti-money laundering.
privacyPolicyAssurance: All the aforementioned is in place in order to assure {client_name} Gaming Platform Users that at all times personal data is:
privacyPolicyAssurance1: Processed in accordance with the rights of the User concerned;
privacyPolicyAssurance3: Obtained only for a specific and lawful purpose
privacyPolicyAssurance6: Not kept longer than is necessary for its purpose
privacyPolicyAssurance7: Not transferred to jurisdictions not adhering to the aforementioned Directives
privacyPolicyAssurance8: Is utilised for marketing purposes based on the so-called opt-in principle.
privacyPolicyDisclosure: The only time that {client_name} Gaming Platform may disclose personal data is when ordered to do so by a decision deriving from the Governing Law and/or when ordered to do so by order of the Governing Authority and/or when ordered to do so by order of the Data Protection Commissioner and/or in the event of an User being directly and/or indirectly involved in a crime that involves a {client_name} Gaming Platform Account.
privacyPolicyEmail: {client_name} Gaming Platform has adopted best practice when it comes to the principles of E-mail communication with its Clients.
privacyPolicyEmployee: All {client_name} Gaming Platform employees are required to comply with the terms of this Privacy Policy. This Privacy Policy provides that employees are obliged to keep Player information strictly confidential. This obligation continues once an employee has left {client_name} Gaming Platform.
privacyPolicyIntro: {client_name} Gaming Platform is committed to respecting the Player’s privacy and to complying with applicable data protection laws.
privacyPolicyMarketing: As indicated above, {client_name} Gaming Platform would, on occasion, market directly to Player products and services which {client_name} Gaming Platform considers may be of interest to the Player. Should Player not wish to receive such information, or have any other data protection queries, Player is urged to contact {client_name} Gaming Platform for such information/changes.
privacyPolicyRegistration: By registering with {client_name} Gaming Platform, the Player is accepting that {client_name} Gaming Platform stores and processes the information entered in addition to the general system information and that activities are logged (see General T&Cs for more detail).
privacyPolicyRights: The Player can write to us at any time to obtain a copy of his information and to have any inaccuracies corrected. Where appropriate, the Player may have his personal information erased, rectified, amended or completed. In order to contact us regarding his information the User should click on the Support option available on the website. {client_name} Gaming Platform may levy a small charge to cover the cost of administration regarding any request made by the Player in this regard.
privacyPolicySecurity: {client_name} Gaming Platform takes the security and confidentiality of Users’ personal data seriously and shall endeavour to ensure that such data is not disclosed at any time to any third party without the User’s prior explicit consent.
processData: By registering an Account with us, you implicitly authorise us to process your personal data in compliance with the privacy laws in force. We assure you that your personal data is processed fairly, lawfully and in accordance with good practice and is only collected for the specific purposes of providing the services offered by the Company, in accordance with these Terms and Conditions.
prohibitedCountries: Registration is prohibited to residents of the USA and Israel as well as residents of any other country where prohibited by local laws. It is your responsibility to know whether the registration or use of an Account is allowed within your jurisdiction. We are under no obligation to refund any funds you may have wagered or won through such account.

promotions_ul1: 1.Create an account with BigWin and deposit at least €20.
promotions_ul2: 2.No promo code needed, you get your bonus straight away!.
promotions_ul3: 3. Set sail towards thrilling adventures with your first deposit bonus
registerAccount: In order to place a real money bet via the Website, you must register an account on the website.
registrationInfo: When registering your Account, you will be asked to provide us with your personal information, including your name, date of birth, address, telephone number and email address; and a confirmation that you are over 18 years of age.
relatives: "Relatives": spouse, partner, parents, children and/or siblings.
reset_link_success: Password Reset link sent to your email address
responsibility: You understand and accept that we are unable to provide you with any legal advice or assurances and that it is your sole responsibility to ensure that at all times you comply with the laws that govern you and that you have the complete legal right to play the Games. Any participation in the Games is at your sole option, discretion and risk. By playing the Games, you acknowledge that you do not find the Games or any other services available on the Internet Site to be offensive, objectionable, unfair, or indecent in any way.
responsible:
Responsible Gaming

Betz Casino aims to provide you with a safe and secure environment which will give you a pleasant and rewarding experience. We encourage our players to use our services in a responsible manner.

We recommend our players not to allow their gambling to affect their usual daily routine or time spent with family and social activities. Making sure that the money they spend is set aside for leisure time and not for other purposes.

For those players who wish to restrict their gambling at Betz Casino, we provide voluntary self-exclusion tools, which enable you to close your account or restrict your ability to place bets. If you would like to discuss our self-exclusion process, please contact Customer Support.

Please take note; accounts closed under our self-exclusion policy cannot be reversed or reopened for any reason. However, once your self-exclusion has expired, we will email you to let you know your account is active again. Permanent self-exclusion will remain in place indefinitely.

Underage

If you wish to gamble with us at Betz Casino, you must be over 18 years of age or the legal minimum age for gambling in the jurisdiction you reside in under the laws applicable to you.

term1: 1. The Bonus amount must be wagered a total of 35 times before it becomes withdrawable cash.
term10: 10. {client_name} reserves the right to void any Bonus funds and winnings if a Player has breached any of the terms listed on the Bonus Terms and Conditions or General Terms and Conditions pages.
term11: 11. {client_name} reserves the right to void any Bonus funds and winnings if a player is abusing any promotion or applying fraud methods.
term12: 12. {client_name} reserves the right to modify/update/cancel any promotion at any given time, without prior notification.
term13: 13. You are not allowed to use your bonus funds while you have open casino or sports bets.
term14: 14. The English version of “Bonus Terms and Conditions” has full legal effect. The translations into other languages are made for informational purposes and to ease understanding for all players. In the event of any discrepancies between the English version and any other version, the English version will prevail at all times.
term2: 2. Once a player has qualified for the Bonus, their funds will be used in the following order:
term3: 3. Feature Buys are not allowed using bonus funds.
term4: 4. There is a maximum bet amount per round using Bonus Funds equal to $/€5.
term5: 5. Whenever the Bonus amount falls below €0.10, the Bonus is automatically closed and forfeited.
term6: 6. The offers are only valid once per customer, computer, IP address and household.
term7: 7. Not all game types contribute the same to the wagering requirements (Listed below).
term8: 8. There are games that DO NOT contribute to the wagering at all (Listed below).
term9: 9. Whenever a player requests a withdrawal before wagering requirements are met all bonuses are forfeited.
